name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.5 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 63,172 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
